```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

### 1. Plant Height
```{r}
height <- c(30.7, 37.6 ,28.4 ,NA, 33.2)
```

### 2. Plant Mass
```{r}
mass <- c(4, 5.2, 3.7, NA, 4.6)
```

### 3. Make a Matrix and Add Column/Row Names
```{r}
plant_info <- c(height, mass)
plant_matrix <- matrix(plant_info, nrow = 5)
plant_matrix
```

```{r}
column_names <- c("height", "mass")
colnames(plant_matrix) <- column_names

row_names <- c("plant1", "plant2", "plant3", "plant4", "plant5")
rownames(plant_matrix) <- row_names
plant_matrix
```

### 4. Calculate Means and Add to Matrix
```{r}
plant_means <- colMeans(plant_matrix, na.rm=T)
all_plant_matrix <- rbind(plant_matrix, plant_means)
```

```{r}
all_plant_matrix
```
